recordTypes.name: Building Permit - Residential (ONE AND TWO FAMILY DWELLINGS ONLY)
recordTypes.description: This application is used for new construction, renovations, alterations, partial and interior demolition and major repairs ONLY FOR one and two family buildings.

recordTypes.name: Building Permit - Commercial and Other than One and Two Family Dwellings
recordTypes.description: This application is used for new construction, renovations, alterations, partial and interior demolition and major repairs to existing commercial and  OTHER than one and two family dwellings

recordTypes.name: ACCESSORY DWELLING UNIT (ADU)
recordTypes.description: This application is used for ACCESSORY DWELLING UNITS ONLY

recordTypes.name: Gas Fitter Permit Application
recordTypes.description: This permit is required when natural gas/propane gas piping is installed, altered, added to or repaired, including the installation of gas fired appliances. You must be a licensed professional to apply for this permit.

recordTypes.name: Sheet Metal/Mechanical  Permit
recordTypes.description: This permit is required when a sheet metal worker is manufacturing, fabricating, assembling, handling, erecting, installing, dismantling, alteration and/or repairing duct work, commercial fans, kitchen hoods and vents, architectural sheet metal and metal roofing.

recordTypes.name: Sign Permit Application
recordTypes.description: A permit is required for all signs.
